movies.title: Summer with the Ghosts
movies.plot: A young girl and her new friend investigate a series of supernatural happenings in the Austrian children's film SUMMER WITH THE GHOSTS. Caroline departs from her home in Montreal to join her father a famous film director on the set of his latest film in Austria. When she arrives however she learns of a series of accidents and problems on the film set with everyone at odds to explain how they happened. Suspecting that someone means to sabotage the film she begins to investigate the ancient castle being used as the set. Along with her newfound friend Jakob she discovers that the film's difficulties may in fact have a supernatural cause.
movies.simplePlot: A young girl and her new friend investigate a series of supernatural happenings in the Austrian children's film SUMMER WITH THE GHOSTS. Caroline departs from her home in Montreal to join ...

biography.bio: After her education at drama school Krauss in Vienna and Le Coque in Paris, Konstanze Breitebner got engagements at Europe's most famous stages, such as Volkstheater, Vienna or Schauspiel Bonn. From the 1980s she worked with well known directors and played in numerous television plays and films. For 15 years Breitebner has been married to Peter Mazzuchelli, with whom she has a daughter.
biography.name: Konstanze Breitebner

biography.bio: Nikola Culka is an actor, known for Summer with the Ghosts (2004).
biography.name: Nikola Culka

biography.bio: Born in Montreal, Quebec, Canada - and the son of a French Canadian taxi driver and an Irish/French homemaker - Richard has been acting and singing since he was 15 years old - after seeing a production of ''Same Time, Next Year'' on Broadway. Richard then let his fingers do the walking and found the Actor's Studio in Montreal. He has never looked back and has had the honor to work opposite some of The Finest Artists in the Entertainment Industry. Richard is writing a pilot with Joanne Vannicola for a new series that is in development.
biography.name: Richard Jutras

biography.bio: Sarah-Jeanne Labrosse was born on the 16th of August 1991 in Montreal, Quebec. Sarah-Jeanne was raised in both English language and French language as her father is an English-speaker and her mother is french-speaker. She started acting at the age of 7. She is the recipient of two Karv Awards in 2015, one for "Best Interpretation in a Youth Series" in Le Chalet and the second for "Personality of the year". She is also recipient of a Artis Awards for "Best Interpretation in a Youth Series" in 2016 and also was the youngest to be nominated "Personality of the year" for an Artis Awards. Labrosse made her American television debut in 2007 in Human Trafficking as Annie Gray, and then on big screen in Eastern Promises as Tatiana where she was directed by David Cronenberg. Between 2009 and 2015 she had stopped working in English because her work schedule in french didn't allow it. She is known for Bon cop Bad cop, 15/love, Eastern Promises, Starbuck, Unité 9, Yamaska, Le Chalet and Les Pays d'en Haut.
biography.name: Sarah-Jeanne Labrosse

biography.bio: Ron Lea was born in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. He is an actor and director, known for The Recruit (2003), Doc (2001) and Saw IV (2007).
biography.name: Ron Lea

biography.bio: Walter Mathes is an actor, known for Auf Teufel komm raus (1995), Henry Dunant: Du rouge sur la croix (2006) and Summer with the Ghosts (2004).
biography.name: Walter Mathes

biography.bio: Karl Merkatz was born on November 17, 1930 in Wiener Neustadt, Lower Austria, Austria. He is an actor, known for Der Bockerer (1981), Der Bockerer 2 (1996) and Anfang 80 (2011).
biography.name: Karl Merkatz

biography.bio: Amanda Tilson was born in 1991 in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. She is an actress and assistant director, known for The Greatest Game Ever Played (2005), The Perfect Teacher (2010) and Turned Inside Out (2014).
biography.name: Amanda Tilson
